com.storageroomapp.client.util

Class StorageRoomUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.storageroomapp.client.util.StorageRoomUtil

  • public class StorageRoomUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides various utilities and constants useful when interacting with the StorageRoom REST API

      • URL_BASE

        public static final java.lang.String URL_BASE
        Core path from which all API paths are based. This should only be used during the initial request, and hypermedia used thereafter
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • decorateUrl

        public static java.lang.String decorateUrl(java.lang.String url,
                           java.lang.String authToken,
                           boolean jsonRepresentation,
                           java.lang.String extraQueryParams)
        Marks up a url with necessary query parameters
        Parameters:
        url - the String unadorned API url
        authToken - the String authToken for this 'application'
        jsonRepresentation - a boolean, true if JSON is desired; should be 'true' unless you know otherwise
        extraQueryParams - a String concatenation of extra query params to tack onto the url ; do not prepend with &
        Returns:
        the adorned url

        Returns:
        the Calendar, or null if not a valid time String
